mapper.sql: qa_id, enable, create_date, creator_id, creator_name, update_date, qa_status
mapper.select:
select
,
from qa_sheet where 1=1
and question_content like '%${questionContent}%'
mapper.insert:
insert into qa_sheet
qa_id,
enable,
create_date,
creator_id,
creator_name,
update_date,
qa_status,
question_content,
question_answer,

mapper.update:
update qa_sheet
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
qa_status = #{qaStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
question_content = #{questionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
question_answer = #{questionAnswer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where qa_id = #{qaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
